attributes.action: Mental Health needs to be focused on not egnored
attributes.additional_details: I want this because I've lost a lot of people frew mental health I also suffer with it , it's discusting that people are being egnored this country needs to focus on mental health and there own people and stop focusing on other countries
attributes.background: More places for people with mental health to get help and listened to more places for people to talk about mental health

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600251

Hold a public inquiry into mental health services in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602637

You can find out how to access NHS mental health services, if you haven’t already sought help for this condition: https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/nhs-services/how-to-access-mental-health-services/

If you're concerned about yourself or a loved one, you can find out how you can get help from a mental health charity or organisation here: https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/charity-and-voluntary-services/get-help-from-mental-health-helplines/
